availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kentucky soldier and lawyer. Married to Rhoda A. Friend. Father of John M. Friend, Belbrand P. Friend, Gallatin Friend, and Charles E. Friend. Served as a second lieutenant in the 38th Enrolled Militia of Floyd County.

bibl.p: KYR-0002-022-0002; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, p. 1; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, Precinct No 8, p. 37; Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, Prestonsburg Precinct No 8, p. 5.
